ringOfSexyUnderwear.name: RING OF SEXY UNDERWEAR
ringOfSexyUnderwear.description: A ring with an engraving of a pair of strangely attractive undergarments. +3 PRS

ringOfFrenchAccent.name: FRENCHLY ACCENTED RING
ringOfFrenchAccent.description: A ring that somehow magically forces you to speak in a French accent. VERY sexy! +5 PRS

ringValentines.name: VALENTINE'S DAY RING
ringValentines.description: A ring that was given to somebody by their Valentine... and dumped down a hole. You see 'Amy' engraved onto a heart. How sad. +5 HP

ringBloodstream.name: BLOODSTREAM NOSERING
ringBloodstream.description: A nosering that injects blood into your veins. Sounds painful... +8 HP

ringOfHardening.name: COCKRING OF HARDENING
ringOfHardening.description: A piercing for your cock that doubles as a sort of penis pill. One size fits all! +2 DEF

ringPectoralPiercing.name: PECTORAL PIERCING
ringPectoralPiercing.description: A piercing that can fit anywhere on your big, juicy pectorals. +5 DEF

ringPinkyToe.name: PINKY TOE RING
ringPinkyToe.description: A ring for your pinky toe. The only way for this to work is by putting it directly through the toenail... kinda like that SpongeBob episode! +1 SPD

ringCrack.name: CRACK INFUSED RING
ringCrack.description: A ring infused with crack cocaine. +2 SPD

ringGamble.name: GAMBLER'S RING
ringGamble.description: A cheap looking ring with a 240p image of a slot machine on it. +2 LUK

ringEscobar.name: PABLO ESCOBAR'S GOLDEN RING
ringEscobar.description: A golden ring that once belonged to Pablo Escobar. It smells rather illegal, but who give a shit? +4 LUK

ringOfSightliness.name: RING OF SIGHTLINESS
ringOfSightliness.description: A ring with an eyeball so realistic looking, it could actually be real. Allows you to see better in the Tardspire

ringOfStinky.name: RING OF STINKY
ringOfStinky.description: A ring so stinky, SO putrid, that even monsters will reconsider confronting you. Reduces encounter rate by 30%

ringOfAmplifiedAudio.name: RING OF AMPLIFIED AUDIO
ringOfAmplifiedAudio.description: A ring with a tiny, yet deceptively loud megaphone. Miniphone? idk. +2 PRS and a PRS attempt
